---
title: "Download dada2"
---

## Source

* Current Release [(1.0)](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/releases): [Zipped](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.0.zip) or [tarball](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.0.tar.gz).

* Development Branch [(1.1)](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2): [Zipped](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/master.zip) or [tarball](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/master.tar.gz).

## Binaries

Binaries are available through [Bioconductor](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/3.3/bioc/html/dada2.html). Currently, **binary installation is only supported for the current release version of dada2, and only on  R 3.3 and later**.

```S
## try http:// if https:// URLs are not supported
source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("dada2")
```
